RestApi module¶

class RestApi.RestApi(DatabaseWrapper)¶

RestApi is the central class used for the REST API, all REST enpoints pass through this class. The functions used in those endpoints are documented in their respective files.

accreditPublication(publicationID)¶
advancedSearch(searchTerms, skip, length, sortBy, sort)¶
createAccount(username, password, permission, firstName, surname, initials)¶

see restAccounts.createAccount() for more info
